entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Rain across upper Richelieu early this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to 8 by morning. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High 11.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 11. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
